title: #129 Kobi Omenaka
itunes:title: #129 Kobi Omenaka
itunes:subtitle: This week I talk to Kobi Omenaka about his brother, who passed away when they were teenagers. As ever we talk grief, computer games + good teachers.You can follow Kobi on Twitter @kobestarr and you can follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheG...
description:
This week I talk to Kobi Omenaka about his brother, who passed away when they were teenagers. As ever we talk grief, computer games + good teachers.


You can follow Kobi on Twitter @kobestarr and you can follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheGriefcast


Griefcast is hosted by Cariad Lloyd, edited by Kate Holland, recorded at Whistledown Studios (or Cariad's living room in lockdown), artwork is by Jayde Perkin and the music is provided by The Glue Ensemble.

And remember, you are not alone.


Rose D'or Nominee 2019, Podcast of the Year 2018, Best Podcast ARIA's 2018.

"the pandemic's most important podcast" Telegraph



Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
